thread.title: Keith Sweat is bringing the Soul to Birmingham
thread.title_full: Keith Sweat is bringing the Soul to Birmingham

title: Keith Sweat is bringing the Soul to Birmingham
text:
The renowned performer, recording artist, producer, Georgia Music Hall of Famer, Soul Train Awards Lifetime Achievement Recipient and father of four is a global star. He will play at Birmingham’s Institute tomorrow. F0r more information on events in and around Birmingham click here. 
Sweat is host of the nationally syndicated radio program The Sweat Hotel. Sweat brings his quiet storm of R&B and slow jamz to listeners nationwide. Broadcasting live from Atlanta, he welcomes special guests and features live in-studio musical performances. What do you think?
